original_solution_mapping.L1: If Hurley is 14 years old, and the difference in ages between Richard and Hurley is 20, Richard is 20+14 = <<20+14=34>>34
original_solution_mapping.L2: Forty years from now, Hurley will be 14+40 = <<14+40=54>>54 years old.
original_solution_mapping.L3: Richard will be 40+34 = <<40+34=74>>74 years forty years from now.
original_solution_mapping.L4: Their combined ages forty years from now will be 74+54 = <<74+54=128>>128 years

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 4075.
    Returns: the combined ages of Richard and Hurley 40 years from now.
    """
    # L1
    hurley_current_age = 14 # Hurley is 14 years old
    age_difference = 20 # difference in ages between Richard and Hurley is 20
    richard_current_age = age_difference + hurley_current_age

    # L2
    years_from_now = 40 # 40 years from now
    hurley_future_age = hurley_current_age + years_from_now

    # L3
    richard_future_age = years_from_now + richard_current_age

    # L4
    combined_future_ages = richard_future_age + hurley_future_age

    # FA
    answer = combined_future_ages
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: If Hurley is {hurley_current_age} years old, and the difference in ages between Richard and Hurley is {age_difference}, Richard is {age_difference}+{hurley_current_age} = <<{age_difference}+{hurley_current_age}={richard_current_age}>>{richard_current_age}
Forty years from now, Hurley will be {hurley_current_age}+{years_from_now} = <<{hurley_current_age}+{years_from_now}={hurley_future_age}>>{hurley_future_age} years old.
Richard will be {years_from_now}+{richard_current_age} = <<{years_from_now}+{richard_current_age}={richard_future_age}>>{richard_future_age} years forty years from now.
Their combined ages forty years from now will be {richard_future_age}+{hurley_future_age} = <<{richard_future_age}+{hurley_future_age}={combined_future_ages}>>{combined_future_ages} years
